conbody.p: Select HelpCheck for updates from the teacher module main menu to check for available Dialog Nibelung software updates.
conbody.note: Teacher workstation must have access to the Internet in order to check for available software updates.
conbody.p: When a new version of the software is available for download, a window will appear on your screen informing you on the version of the update and a list of new features an bug fixes in it ( ).
Press Download button to download new version of the software. A window will appear with a download progress bar ( ).

After update has finished downloading, the Install _fixme_ [ui] button becomes enabled. Press this button to update the teacher module. After teacher module has been successfully updated, you can update student modules by selecting HelpUpdate student modules from the menu.
Because student workstation may have to be rebooted during the update process, you will need to confirm your intention to proceed with the update of student modules ( ).
conbody.note: Please note that all student modules must be active and in communication with the teacher module to perform their update ( ).
